channel.title: cattaro-dhamma on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha
channel.description: Recent content in cattaro-dhamma on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha

item.title: 18th Anniversary and Update
item.description: This is where I live Wow! Today is February 7th and another year has passed. I have now completed 18 years total as a monk and I am working on my 19th year. Of course, my monk age is 12 rainy seasons because I changed Nikayas after my 6th year. I have been living my monk life in Kauai, Hawaii for about 10 months now and things have been moving along.
